ghostPost.title: DSNP Update: February 2022
ghostPost.excerpt:
In February, we completed our spec updates - more information on the revisions
below. As we dig into new ‘Getting Started 1
[https://forums.projectliberty.io/t/draft-list-of-developer-documentation-for-comment/183]
’ documentation, are we missing anything you feel is a priority? What sample
code and tutorials would you find most helpful? As always, we invite you to add
your comments and questions to the discussions at forums.projectliberty.io
[https://forums.projectliberty.io/] - and thanks!

Fe
ghostPost.plaintext:
In February, we completed our spec updates - more information on the revisions
below. As we dig into new ‘Getting Started 1
[https://forums.projectliberty.io/t/draft-list-of-developer-documentation-for-comment/183]
’ documentation, are we missing anything you feel is a priority? What sample
code and tutorials would you find most helpful? As always, we invite you to add
your comments and questions to the discussions at forums.projectliberty.io
[https://forums.projectliberty.io/] - and thanks!

February DSNP update - Summary of progress

 * Spec reorganization update is live: https://spec.dsnp.org/ 1
   [https://spec.dsnp.org/]
 * View the reorg pull request for the reasoning behind it.
 * Reorganize the Spec by wilwade · Pull Request #140 · LibertyDSNP/spec ·
   GitHub 1 [https://github.com/LibertyDSNP/spec/pull/140]
 * Also with splitting the spec into three components for the reasons described
   in the above PR, we have created a new versioning process. More detail
   available in this comment.
 * Reorganize the Spec by wilwade · Pull Request #140 · LibertyDSNP/spec ·
   GitHub [https://github.com/LibertyDSNP/spec/pull/140/files#r817704478]
 * Updating ParquetJS to convert to Typescript for type safety and bug
   squashing.
 * Starting this month, we are publishing our weekly spec discussion meetings
   [https://vimeo.com/showcase/weekly-dsnp-spec-meeting].
 * Chain Selection: We have narrowed down to two candidates. We hope to share
   more information later this month.

Upcoming

 * Working on DIP changing how batch signatures work
ghostPost.html:
In February, we completed our spec updates - more information on the revisions below. As we dig into new ‘Getting Started 1’ documentation, are we missing anything you feel is a priority? What sample code and tutorials would you find most helpful? As always, we invite you to add your comments and questions to the discussions at forums.projectliberty.io - and thanks!

February DSNP update - Summary of progress

  • Spec reorganization update is live: https://spec.dsnp.org/ 1
  • View the reorg pull request for the reasoning behind it.
  • Reorganize the Spec by wilwade · Pull Request #140 · LibertyDSNP/spec · GitHub 1
  • Also with splitting the spec into three components for the reasons described in the above PR, we have created a new versioning process. More detail available in this comment.
  • Reorganize the Spec by wilwade · Pull Request #140 · LibertyDSNP/spec · GitHub
  • Updating ParquetJS to convert to Typescript for type safety and bug squashing.
  • Starting this month, we are publishing our weekly spec discussion meetings.
  • Chain Selection: We have narrowed down to two candidates. We hope to share more information later this month.

Upcoming

  • Working on DIP changing how batch signatures work
